parameters.content:
# üöÄ Market Research Analytics System

> **Transform Google Maps data into actionable business insights with AI-powered analysis**

## üìã Overview

This n8n workflow automatically collects business data from Google Maps, analyzes customer reviews using AI, and generates comprehensive market research reports delivered straight to your inbox.

---

## ‚ö° Quick Start Guide

### Step 1: Configure Your Search Parameters

Navigate to the **"Configuration Variables"** node and update these fields:

```json
{
  "search_query": "restaurants downtown",        // Your target business type + location
  "search_location": "@40.7589,-73.9851,12z",   // Coordinates (lat,lng,zoom)
  "language_code": "en",                         // Language: en, vi, es, fr, etc.
  "analysis_focus": "restaurant",                // Business category for analysis
  "city_name": "New York City"                   // Target city name
}
```

**üîç Need coordinates?** Use [LatLong.net](https://www.latlong.net/) to find your target location coordinates.

---

### Step 2: Setup API Keys

#### üîë SerpAPI (Google Maps Data)
1. **Get API Key:** Visit [SerpAPI Google Maps Reviews](https://serpapi.com/google-maps-reviews-api)
2. **Sign up** for free account (100 searches/month included)
3. **Copy your API key** from the dashboard
4. **Update workflow:** Replace `YOUR_SERPAPI_KEY_HERE` in both HTTP nodes

#### ü§ñ Google Gemini AI (Analysis)
1. **Get API Key:** Visit [Google AI Studio](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/api-key)
2. **Create new API key** (free tier available)
3. **Setup in n8n:** Add credentials in "Google Gemini Chat Model" node

---

### Step 3: Configure Email Delivery

1. **Open** the **"Send Email Report"** node
2. **Update recipient:** Change `your-email@example.com` to your email
3. **Gmail setup:** Connect your Gmail account in n8n credentials

---

### Step 4: Execute & Enjoy! üéâ
